subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Vincenzo Nibali won Stage 13 of the Tour de France, from St.-Étienne to Chamrousse, on Friday. Richie Porte, who had been second, lost ground and dropped to 16th.
snippet: Vincenzo Nibali won Stage 13 of the Tour de France, from St.-Étienne to Chamrousse, on Friday. Richie Porte, who had been second, lost ground and dropped to 16th.
